title: Predictors of human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) infection in primary care among adults living in developed countries: a systematic review
content: Systematic Reviews  https://systematicreviewsjournal.biomedcentral.com/articles [Accessed 2 Jun 2018]  Research Predictors of human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) infection in primary care among adults living in developed countries: a systematic review Early diagnosis of human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) is important because antiretroviral therapies are more effective if infected individuals are diagnosed early. Diagnosis of HIV relies on laboratory testing...  Authors: Benhildah N. Rumbwere Dube, Tom P. Marshall, Ronan P. Ryan and Modupe Omonijo Citation: Systematic Reviews 2018 7:82 Published on: 2 June 2018
